title: Smartphone ownership in the U.S. 2015 - 2018 , by age group
summary: Overall 50-64, and 65+ are gradually increasing, 18-29, and 30-49 are roughly constant,  throughout the Year
The order of lines according to average values of SOME LABEL, in descending order is: 1. 18-29, 2. 30-49, 3. 50-64, and lastly, 4. 65+.
65+ reported the lowest SOME LABEL about 46.0 in Year 2017
